group_1.narration: Round and round it spins.@Voices sing, as many as the stars sparkling in the heavens.@She listens to them all,@but the goddess's eyes fixate upon only one record.
The goddess, of course, had reason@to give such special treatment to it,@this record that plays "new" singing voices still.
In this vast, vast universe,@there is nothing the goddess knows not.
For the goddess knows and cherishes all records,@and remembers them well.
Huh? Was there a record like this?
She found them while the stars twinkled in their sleep,@but here another record lies,@forgotten to be spun.
One that should be known, yet is "unknown".@One she should have remembered,@yet her eyes have "met them for the first time".@This record perplexed the goddess.
The goddess recognizes the singing voices@playing upon the engraved record.@They belong to Magical Girls upon whom@she has granted her blessings.
But it had only just begun.
As she continued listening,@the goddess realized her blessed song@had not touched upon this record,@as if the "unknown" voices were engraving it.
As she gazed upon this mysterious record,@observing the slightest strain of the grooves@as they are engraved,@she knew this record was still being made.
After some hesitation,@the goddess decided to watch over this "special" record.
For if she forced her blessed song upon this record,@it may very well break.
